title: Why Your Keys Are Staggered (And Why Ortholinear Might Be Better)
description: Standard keyboards are staggered because of typewriters. Ortholinear (grid) layouts make more sense for fingers.
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
The Stagger

Look at your keyboard. The Q is not directly above the A. This is a relic of mechanical linkages.

The Grid

Ortholinear keyboards align keys in straight columns. This reduces lateral finger movement and can be more ergonomic once learned.

Popular Models

Planck (40%) and Preonic (50%).
